[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Note: this mod is no longer under active development. I'll potentially come back to this in the future but for now I have my time filled with other things. Thank you for your understanding![/h1]
A mod that changes the default behavior of the sun lamp and hydroponic basins.
Changes:
* Sun Lamps - Increased light radius - Doesn't turn off at night - Outputs much more heat
* Hydroponic Basins - Decreased cost, allowing 16 basins and a Sun Lamp from a single Geothermal Power Generator - Plants in basins don't rest at night
